response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product holds immense value for us, reflecting over $8,000 worth of investment in research, development, materials, and labor. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe it could significantly enhance your business operations or personal needs. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $12,000, which includes a comprehensive warranty and dedicated customer support. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll consider this opportunity to elevate your experience with our product. If you have any questions or require further information, please feel free to ask. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
